1370: Hardenbernus was born in Trysgens in 1370.
Got married to Reymodis at age 23 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Reymodis, Ghela, at age 23.
1371: Had a daughter with Reymodis, Marisseis, at age 24.
1372: Had a son with Reymodis, Meynolphus, at age 25.
1374: Had a son with Reymodis, Eelbout, at age 27.
Lost son Eelbout when Eelbout was 1 years old.
1375: Had a son with Reymodis, Sollen, at age 28.
1378: Lost his wife Reymodis while she was giving birth to Hatebrandus in 1378.
1390: Lost son Hatebrandus when Hatebrandus was 13 years old.
